content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
Readers of this list may be interested in the attached graph, which
shows how the size of Isabelle distributions has grown from 1992 to
2005. It's somewhat approximate in that the distributions were not
equally spaced, but the trend is clearly linear. Most of this
material consists of proofs rather than ML code.

Larry Paulson
isabelle-growth.jpg
